alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued July 16 at 12:58PM EDT until July 16 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 497 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MAINE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MAINE CUMBERLAND YORK IN NEW HAMPSHIRE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL NEW HAMPSHIRE BELKNAP MERRIMACK STRAFFORD IN NORTHERN NEW HAMPSHIRE CARROLL IN SOUTHERN NEW HAMPSHIRE HILLSBOROUGH ROCKINGHAM THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALFRED, ATKINSON, BARRINGTON, BIDDEFORD, BOSCAWEN, BRIDGEWATER, BROOKFIELD, CANTERBURY, CAPE ELIZABETH, CHESTER, CONCORD, DERRY, DOVER, DUNBARTON, DURHAM, GILFORD, HAMPSTEAD, HOLLIS, JACKSON, LACONIA, LEBANON, LOUDON, MADBURY, MANCHESTER, NASHUA, NEW GLOUCESTER, NEWTON, OLD ORCHARD BEACH, OSSIPEE, PELHAM, PLAISTOW, PORTLAND, ROCHESTER, ROLLINSFORD, SACO, SALEM, SANFORD, SOMERSWORTH, SOUTH PORTLAND, TUFTONBORO, WAKEFIELD, WESTBROOK, AND WOLFEBORO.
